name: @stator/stator
description: WIP: a highly capable state-based routing library that treats the URI as an interface to application state, represented by a single object.

scripts.version: git commit -am "Update version number" && git checkout -b release && git add -f dist/
scripts.deploy: git push --tags && git checkout master && git branch -D release
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm run deploy
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run deploy
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run deploy
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run deploy

author: Jan Jorgensen
